title: To Explain Iraq's Crisis, Some Lawmakers Point To 2011 Withdrawal
teaser: The Obama administration is drawing criticism from Republicans for its handling of the deteriorating security situation in Iraq. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with national political correspondent Mara Liasson about the administrations choices and the possible political consequences for the President.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
